articles.author: SI Reporter
articles.title: FMCG, select banks help Sensex, Nifty snap 5-day losing streak; Metals dip - Business Standard
articles.description: CLOSING BELL:  Nestle, Titan, Hindustan Unilever and Asian Paints were the major gainers among the Sensex-30 pack; while Tata Steel, IndusInd Bank and Bharti Airtel were the top losers.
articles.content:
TopicsMARKET WRAP | MARKET LIVE | Indian markets
